message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $8000 for it. Can we meet in the middle at $9500?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I have to make a living too. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than $9500. How about we settle on $11000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $11000 is still a bit too steep for me. I'm willing to pay up to $8000, as I mentioned earlier. Can we try to meet me at $9000?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet you at $10500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $10500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $8000, as I mentioned earlier. Can we try to meet me at $9500?

Bob, I'm starting to think you're not serious about buying the product. I've already compromised significantly, and I need to think about other options. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Take it or leave it.
